Always write commit messages in English.
Always use double quotes for strings in JavaScript/TypeScript.
Always use semicolons at the end of statements in JavaScript/TypeScript.
Always use imports without explicit file extensions in JavaScript/TypeScript.
Always prefer async/await over .then() for handling promises in JavaScript/TypeScript.
Always use typescript types and interfaces to define object shapes.
When creating database schema, use UUIDs as primary keys instead of auto-incrementing integers.
